title: Cascada: Unisex Merino Base Layer Bottoms
content:
Cascada continues to roll out its in-house developed, made in Italy wool baselayers with these unisex merino base layer bottoms. These slim-fitting baselayers are made from a merino blend (45% Merino Wool, 40% Polyester, 10% Polyamide, 5% Elastomer) to extend their lifespan, making them resistant to moths, and resistant to wear and tear. These base layers come in grey or tan and are in stock now, shipping direct from Cascada for â‚¬85,00.

The post Cascada: Unisex Merino Base Layer Bottoms appeared first on The Radavist.
author: prolly
